charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was visiting the
ocean with friends.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1101_0200_:
While they were there, they encountered 
a rambunctious pink object bouncing around.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1101_0700_:
Incredibly, the pink object turned out to be
Whitney’s Miltank.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_0800_:
Sorry if we scared ya! Miltank and I were just
playin’ a little.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0301_0900_: Is this the time to play?
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0401_1000_: You don’t have to be so hard on us!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0401_1100_: It’s not like we’re playin’ all the time!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0302_1200_: Taking a rest sometimes is important.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0402_1400_: Sometimes you gotta let your hair down!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_1500_:
When I’m here, it sure does make me
feel relaxed.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_1600_:
Oceans and ranches... That’s what we’re all
about, after all.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0401_1800_:
Things look a little different where I come from,
but there’s an ocean right by my hometown of
Goldenrod City, too.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0402_2000_:
Things look a little different where I come from,
but there’s an ocean right by my hometown of
Goldenrod City, too.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_2100_:
And Miltank grew up on a ranch. 
That’s where I first met her.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_2200_:
Thinkin’ about it takes me back to that first time
I ever went to visit that ranch.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_2300_:
All of a sudden, Miltank used Rollout and
came right at me!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_2400_: It was like she was tryin’ to test me!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0401_2600_:
Well, I can’t be sure, but I think Miltank was
lookin’ for someone to come and take her away
from that ranch.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0402_2800_:
Well, I can’t be sure, but I think Miltank was
lookin’ for someone to come and take her away
from that ranch.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_2900_:
But not just anyone, so she used that move to
see if I was the right Trainer for her.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_3000_: Although I didn’t know that at the time!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_3100_:
Of course, I dodged her Rollout, but I wondered
what in the world was goin’ on!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_3200_:
But then she just kept comin’ at me, bumpin’ into
me, sendin’ me flyin’, and I found that
determination so adorable.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_3300_:
Before I knew it, Miltank and I were playin’
together all the time.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0301_3400_: And the ranch let you take her?
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0402_3700_:
Hey now! Don’t go spreadin’ rumors about me
like that!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_3800_:
An old guy at the ranch told me I could
have Miltank.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_3900_:
I mean, he actually was happy to have me take
her off his hands!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_4000_:
He said it seemed like Miltank had always
wanted to leave the ranch and see the world.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_4100_:
That’s why I try to make sure Miltank does more
than just battle. She has to enjoy herself while
she’s out seein’ the world, too!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_4200_:
I gotta make her new life better than her life
back on the ranch.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_4300_: I don’t want her to regret leavin’ her home.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_4800_:
To be honest, I don’t really know what’s best
for Miltank.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_4900_:
But I do know that she knows I’m tryin’ to do my
best for her.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_5000_:
So I hope she stays with me for a long,
long time.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_5100_:
That would be the best!
At least, that’s how I feel about it.
